CustomField.formula: Account.Name + BR() + Text(Salutation) + ' ' + FirstName + ' ' + LastName +BR()+ Account.BillingStreet +BR()+ Account.BillingPostalCode +' '+ Account.BillingCity +BR()+ Account.BillingCountry +BR()+'Tel.: '+ Account.Phone +BR()+'Mobil: '+ MobilePhone +BR()+'Mail: '+ Email
CustomField.label: ContactInfo
